name: Government Archives Metadata
short_description:
This project is supported by the Australian National Data Service (ANDS). ANDS is supported by the Australian Government through the National Collaborative Research Infrastructure Strategy Program and the Education Investment Fund (EIF) Super Science Initiative.

Government Archives across Australia hold massive collections of material of great value however discovering relevant material is currently challenging for researchers. The project has developed software and processes to assist archives in preparing metadata for harvesting by Research Data Australia. 

The project developed SQL stored procedures, PHP scripts, and documents detailing the installation, operation, and customisation of the solution. These are intended to allow other archives to easily implement automated harvesting of archival metadata.  The solution supports OAI-PMH harvesting in RIF-CS formatted XML. A website has not been setup for this project enquiries should be directed to ANDS at www.ands.org.au
summary: Software tools and documentation to expose archival metadata
